Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>There doesn't seem to be any danger at
the moment.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>I wonder... What is this place?


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>There are so many images here that
resemble the giant pictures now found
on the surface of Hyrule.
Could it be that this place is somehow
connected to the ones who left those
pictures behind?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph <clr:0000>shaped like a castle<clr:ffff>.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Lady Impa, let's head down. We must
investigate up close...
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We intend to investigate that geoglyph
as well.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Trouble_00>The literature hints that something related
to the geoglyphs can be found within the
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff>.
The temple is at the bottom of a canyon
in Hebra. I suggest you steel yourself, and
then go and seek it out.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble_01>Hm. <sp:5:0:0>I believe the one we saw first was the
geoglyph on the left edge of the wall.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph that<clr:0000> looks like a stone tablet<clr:ffff>.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble_00>According to the floor map, it is near
<clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL_00>There, upon the walls...<sp:5:0:0>


Are those not...<clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff>?! <sp:5:1:0>Hm.
What could this mean?
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems the locations of the other
geoglyphs from the wall are marked
on the <clr:0000>floor map<clr:ffff> as well.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It is said that the geoglyphs appeared all
over Hyrule during the Upheaval when
Princess Zelda went missing.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hm. How are they connected to these
images here...
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseL_01>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>The images here do seem to be
a reflection of the geoglyphs.

If you intend to investigate the geoglyphs,
courageous one, perhaps you should
somehow make a <clr:0000>copy<clr:ffff> of the map.
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Ah, Link! Are you making progress in your
investigation of the geoglyphs?
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph <clr:0000>shaped like a monster<clr:ffff>.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL_00>I see... So the Dragon's Tears were shed
by Princess Zelda when she transformed.<sp:5:1:0>

And the geoglyphs were drawn by an
ancient people who touched those
memories and saw visions, as you did.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Perhaps in the past they were more
attuned to that sort of thing than the
people of today.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Hm... <sp:5:1:0>I understand now.<sp:5:1:0> So that is the
truth of it all.

Link. <sp:5:1:0>If all of the memories you saw are
true, then that means...

Since our Princess Zelda has become the
Light Dragon, she can never again return
to her original form.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>It is...painfully tragic.<sp:5:1:0> Our dear
Princess Zelda...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>No. It cannot be!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph <clr:0000>shaped like a person<clr:ffff>.
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>There must be a way...some method to
restore Princess Zelda to her former self.

Link, I will return to Kakariko Village and
review the ancient literature once more.

That is the most I can do to help
Princess Zelda...
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The geoglyph in <clr:0000>southern<clr:ffff> Hebra...<sp:5:0:0>
We will likely focus our investigation
there next.
Perhaps you could head that way as well,
courageous one.
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Link! Have you made any progress in
your investigation of the geoglyphs?
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseL_01>There is no time to dawdle! Let us hurry
and investigate the remaining geoglyphs.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> in the Forgotten Temple...
We intend to go on a journey to visit
the geoglyphs it has depicted.
However, it was quite a bit of work to
copy down that map.

If only we'd had a <clr:0000>picture-capturing<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>tool<clr:ffff>
to make quick work of the task...
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you have any new information, can you
please share it with Lady Impa at once?
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>Oh! L-Lady Impa...<sp:5:0:0> Perhaps you should
rest a bit before such a trying journey.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The geoglyph in <clr:0000>southern<clr:ffff> Eldin...<sp:5:0:0>
We will likely focus our investigation
there next.
Perhaps you could head that way as well,
courageous one.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>I suppose our journey has come to an
end... I think I will return to the village
alongside Lady Impa.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>However, I am surprised you feel
comfortable walking about in such
a state of undress...
You have always been so fearless...or
perhaps I should say reckless.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Link, I have been wondering...


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Have you found the geoglyph in
<clr:0000>southern<clr:ffff> Hebra yet?
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The geoglyph in <clr:0000>western<clr:ffff> Necluda...<sp:5:0:0>
We will likely focus our investigation
there next.
Perhaps you could head that way as well,
courageous one.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Link, if you happen to see a geoglyph
during your travels, I urge you to
investigate this matter as well.
If more strange visions are waiting at the
other geoglyphs, <sp:5:0:0>just like the one you
already experienced, well...
Perhaps they will provide clues that could
lead us to Princess Zelda.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh! Link! I am so pleased that you've
come here as well.
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>However, I am surprised that you see fit
to walk around wearing such a thing.
It disturbs me to see you like that.
Although, I suppose that if you dress like
those lost souls, perhaps they will decline
to pick a fight with you.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The geoglyph in the <clr:0000>Gerudo Highlands<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>
We will likely focus our investigation
there next.
Perhaps you could head that way as well,
courageous one.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I can hardly believe what my eyes behold.<sp:5:0:0>
Who could have guessed this old ruin still
held such secrets?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>To be honest, Lady Impa deduced that
there is <clr:0000>something related to the
geoglyphs<clr:ffff> here.
It took some effort for us to get up here,
but we managed it.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But then Lady Impa grew impatient.<sp:5:1:0> The
moment I took my eyes off her, she went
deep into the temple all by herself.
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Once I finish mooring the balloon, I plan
to hurry after her.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Link, I have been wondering...


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Have you found the geoglyph in <clr:0000>western<clr:ffff>
Necluda yet?
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseL_01>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>The images here do seem to be
a reflection of the geoglyphs.

There may even be Dragon's Tears
present at the other geoglyphs, just like
the one you already found.
If you intend to investigate the geoglyphs,
courageous one, perhaps you should
somehow make a <clr:0000>copy<clr:ffff> of the map.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I believe there is <clr:0000>something related to the
geoglyphs<clr:ffff> somewhere within this temple.

I am searching, but so far, it has been in
vain. The chambers here are enormous,
so it will be a difficult task at best.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_00>Where could it be...
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Link, I have been wondering...


<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff>Have you found the geoglyph in the
<clr:0000>Gerudo Highlands<clr:ffff> yet?
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>I wonder... What is this place?


Is it somehow connected to those who
left those giant pictures everywhere?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Oh, Link! Thank you again for your help
with the balloon.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Link, I have been wondering...


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Have you found the geoglyph in <clr:0000>southern<clr:ffff>
Eldin yet?
